content.text: 0) In a large saucepan, combine the eggs, milk and 1/3 cup sugar.

content.text: 1) Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture coats a metal spoon.
3) Cool quickly by placing pan in a sink or bowl of ice water and stirring 1 to 2 minutes.
6) Before serving, whip the cream and 2 tablespoons sugar until soft peaks form.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "whip"@19:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the cream"@24:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "2 tablespoons sugar"@38:57 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until soft peaks form"@58:79 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( cond-6-1 "Before serving"@3:17 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Transfer chilled egg mixture to a punch bowl.
9) Fold in whipped cream mixture and serve at once.
